title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.15 - Limitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.15 - Limitation

State Regulations

If the information required is already available for the same source of water supply or if an emergency exists which requires the development of an emergency source, the requirements of section
5-1.14
of this Subpart shall not apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
